casebody.data:
EDWIN M. NEVILLE, Appellant, v. WILLIAM . V. CHRISTIE, Respondent.

Before Sedgwick and Freedman, JJ.

Decided April 5, 1880. Appeal from judgment dismissing complaint at the trial. Louis F. Murray, attorney, and George M. Curtis, of counsel, for appellant. Miron Winslow, attorney, for respondent. Freedman, J.,

wrote for affirmance, with costs; Sedgwick, J., concurred.
